Title: Microsoft hosts emergency press conference after protesters ‘storm a building’
Description:
Microsoft president Brad Smith hosted an impromptu press conference on Tuesday afternoon, just hours after protesters gained access to a building at the company’s headquarters and held a sit-in demonstration inside his office.
Seated on the edge of his desk, …

Title: 'I immediately freaked out' - Taylor Swift's engagement sends fans into frenzy
Description: From her flowers to the dress - and her overall love life - Swifties pore over every single detail about the superstar.

Title: Gemini CLI is breaking out of the terminal and joining Zed's code editor
Description: Gemini CLI started out as an open-source, text-based AI agent for the terminal, and it's now elevating the experience by partnering with Zed.

Title: A 'college for all' push thrived in New Orleans after Katrina. It wasn't for everyone
Description:
After Hurricane Katrina, many New Orleans charter schools united in a mission to send more students to college.
Today, some of those students, now adults, wish they'd been given more options.

Title: Hurricane Katrina forced changes at FEMA. Trump is rolling them back
Description:
The government's colossal failure to respond after Hurricane Katrina led to major reforms at the nation's top disaster agency.
Now, the Trump administration has reversed some of those changes.

Title: While working as a lawyer, I started posting about my family online. When it took off, I quit, and my site makes over $1 million each year.
Description:
Blair Lonergan was an Ivy League-educated lawyer.
She became a cooking influencer, quit her job, and now her site makes over $1 million annually.

Title: I was laid off from a 6-figure salary job and now deliver DoorDash meals for $3 tips. It's taught me that I'm strong, resilient, and willing to do what it takes.
Description:
Kelly Kanaras was a communications executive with a six-figure salary until she was laid off a month ago.
She took up gig work to stretch her savings.

Title: I quit my job at Google after 2 years. I prepared well for my exit but wish I'd done 3 things differently.
Description:
Erica Rivera worked as a technical recruiter at Google before she quit to become a career coach.
There are three things she regrets not doing.

Title: Inside Hawaii's rent-free, incredibly strict 'Forbidden Island'
Description:
Hawaiians live on this paradise island rent-free.
So long as they don't drink, do drugs, or break any other of the old-world owners' old-school rules.

Title: How to Survive Your Song Going Viral on TikTok

Title: Amid Battlefield 6's Commitment to 'Gritty Realism,' Activision Makes Shock Call of Duty Change for Black Ops 7: 'We Hear the Feedback'
Description: It sounds like all change for Call of Duty with the release of Black Ops 7, amid pressure from Battlefield 6 and its commitment to “gritty realism.”

Title: Paradox are "making adjustments" to Bloodlines 2's day-one vampire clan DLC plans, following backlash
Description:
